body: I just got bitten by this inconsistency as well. Maybe the doc has to be updated to make it more clear? Even giving an example that `a = torch.bernoulli(a)` is the in-place equivalent of `a.bernoulli_(a)` but not `a.bernoulli_()` which is equivalent to `a.bernoulli_(0.5)`?
